verses.verse: In the first <S%H259><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of Darius <S%H1867><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ahasuerus, <S%H325><s%> of Median <S%H4074><s%> descent, <S%H2233><s%> who <S%H834><s%> was made <S%H4427><s%> king <S%H4427><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the kingdom <S%H4438><s%> of the Chaldeans <S%H3778><s%> –

in the first <S%H259><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of his reign <S%H4427><s%> I, Daniel, <S%H1840><s%> observed <S%H995><s%> in the books <S%H5612><s%> the number <S%H4557><s%> of the years <S%H8141><s%> which <S%H834><s%> was [revealed as] the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> to Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%> for the completion <S%H4390><s%> of the desolations <S%H2723><s%> of Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> [namely,] seventy <S%H7657><s%> years. <S%H8141><s%>

So I gave <S%H5414><s%> my attention <S%H6440><s%> to the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H430><s%> to seek <S%H1245><s%> [Him by] prayer <S%H8605><s%> and supplications, <S%H8469><s%> with fasting, <S%H6685><s%> sackcloth, <S%H8242><s%> and ashes. <S%H665><s%>

And I prayed <S%H6419><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> my God <S%H430><s%> and confessed <S%H3034><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Alas, <S%H577><s%> O Lord, <S%H136><s%> the great <S%H1419><s%> and awesome <S%H3372><s%> God, <S%H410><s%> who keeps <S%H8104><s%> His covenant <S%H1285><s%> and lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> for those who love <S%H157><s%> Him and keep <S%H8104><s%> His commandments, <S%H4687><s%>

we have sinned, <S%H2398><s%> committed <S%H5753><s%> iniquity, <S%H5753><s%> acted <S%H7561><s%> wickedly, <S%H7561><s%> and rebelled, <S%H4775><s%> even turning <S%H5493><s%> aside <S%H5493><s%> from Thy commandments <S%H4687><s%> and ordinances. <S%H4941><s%>

"Moreover, we have not listened <S%H8085><s%> to Thy servants <S%H5650><s%> the prophets, <S%H5030><s%> who <S%H834><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> in Thy name <S%H8034><s%> to our kings, <S%H4428><s%> our princes, <S%H8269><s%> our fathers, and all <S%H1><s%> the people <S%H3605><s%> of the land. <S%H5971><s%>

"Righteousness <S%H6666><s%> belongs to Thee, O Lord, <S%H136><s%> but to us open <S%H6440><s%> shame, <S%H1322><s%> as it is this <S%H2088><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> – to the men <S%H376><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> those who are nearby <S%H7138><s%> and those who are far <S%H7350><s%> away in all <S%H3605><s%> the countries <S%H776><s%> to which <S%H834><s%> Thou hast driven <S%H5080><s%> them, because of their unfaithful <S%H4604><s%> deeds <S%H4604><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they have committed <S%H4603><s%> against Thee.

"Open <S%H6440><s%> shame <S%H1322><s%> belongs to us, O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> to our kings, <S%H4428><s%> our princes, <S%H8269><s%> and our fathers, because <S%H1><s%> we have sinned <S%H834><s%> against Thee.
"To the Lord <S%H136><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> belong compassion <S%H7356><s%> and forgiveness, <S%H5547><s%> for we have rebelled <S%H4775><s%> against Him;

nor <S%H3808><s%> have we obeyed <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God, <S%H430><s%> to walk <S%H1980><s%> in His teachings <S%H8451><s%> which <S%H834><s%> He set <S%H5414><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> us through <S%H3027><s%> His servants <S%H5650><s%> the prophets. <S%H5030><s%>

"Indeed all <S%H3605><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> has transgressed <S%H5674><s%> Thy law <S%H8451><s%> and turned <S%H5493><s%> aside, <S%H5493><s%> not obeying <S%H8085><s%> Thy voice; <S%H6963><s%> so the curse <S%H423><s%> has been poured <S%H5413><s%> out on us, along with the oath <S%H7621><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is written <S%H3789><s%> in the law <S%H8451><s%> of Moses <S%H4872><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> for we have sinned <S%H2398><s%> against Him.

"Thus He has confirmed <S%H6965><s%> His words <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> He had spoken <S%H1696><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> us and against <S%H5921><s%> our rulers <S%H8199><s%> who <S%H834><s%> ruled <S%H8199><s%> us, to bring <S%H935><s%> on us great <S%H1419><s%> calamity; <S%H9567><s%> for under <S%H8478><s%> the whole <S%H3605><s%> heaven <S%H8064><s%> there has not been done <S%H6213><s%> [anything] like what <S%H9201><s%> was done <S%H6213><s%> to Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>

"As it is written <S%H3789><s%> in the law <S%H8451><s%> of Moses, <S%H4872><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> calamity <S%H9567><s%> has come <S%H935><s%> on us; yet we have not sought <S%H9134><s%> the favor <S%H9134><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> by turning <S%H7725><s%> from our iniquity <S%H5771><s%> and giving <S%H7919><s%> attention <S%H7919><s%> to Thy truth. <S%H571><s%>

"Therefore, the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has kept <S%H8245><s%> the calamity <S%H9567><s%> in store <S%H8245><s%> and brought <S%H935><s%> it on us; for the Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> is righteous <S%H6662><s%> with respect <S%H5921><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> His deeds <S%H4639><s%> which <S%H834><s%> He has done, <S%H6213><s%> but we have not obeyed <S%H8085><s%> His voice. <S%H6963><s%>

"And now, <S%H6258><s%> O Lord <S%H136><s%> our God, <S%H430><s%> who <S%H834><s%> hast brought <S%H3318><s%> Thy people <S%H5971><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> with a mighty <S%H2389><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%> and hast made <S%H6213><s%> a name <S%H8034><s%> for Thyself, as it is this <S%H2088><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> – we have sinned, <S%H2398><s%> we have been <S%H7561><s%> wicked. <S%H7561><s%>

"O Lord, <S%H136><s%> in accordance with all <S%H3605><s%> Thy righteous <S%H6666><s%> acts, <S%H6666><s%> let now <S%H4994><s%> Thine anger <S%H639><s%> and Thy wrath <S%H2534><s%> turn <S%H7725><s%> away <S%H7725><s%> from Thy city <S%H5892><s%> Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> Thy holy <S%H6944><s%> mountain; <S%H2022><s%> for because <S%H3588><s%> of our sins <S%H2399><s%> and the iniquities <S%H5771><s%> of our fathers, Jerusalem <S%H1><s%> and Thy people <S%H3389><s%> [have become] a reproach <S%H5971><s%> to all <S%H2781><s%> those around <S%H3605><s%> us.

"So now, <S%H6258><s%> our God, <S%H430><s%> listen <S%H8085><s%> to the prayer <S%H8605><s%> of Thy servant <S%H5650><s%> and to his supplications, <S%H8469><s%> and for Thy sake, <S%H4616><s%> O Lord, <S%H136><s%> let Thy face <S%H6440><s%> shine <S%H215><s%> on Thy desolate <S%H8076><s%> sanctuary. <S%H4720><s%>

"O my God, <S%H430><s%> incline <S%H5186><s%> Thine ear <S%H241><s%> and hear! <S%H8085><s%> Open <S%H6491><s%> Thine eyes <S%H5869><s%> and see <S%H7200><s%> our desolations <S%H8074><s%> and the city <S%H5892><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is called <S%H7121><s%> by Thy name; <S%H8034><s%> for we are not presenting <S%H5307><s%> our supplications <S%H8469><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Thee on account <S%H5921><s%> of any merits <S%H6666><s%> of our own, but on account <S%H5921><s%> of Thy great <S%H7227><s%> compassion. <S%H7356><s%>

"O Lord, <S%H136><s%> hear! <S%H8085><s%> O Lord, <S%H136><s%> forgive! <S%H5545><s%> O Lord, <S%H136><s%> listen <S%H7181><s%> and take <S%H6213><s%> action! <S%H6213><s%> For Thine own sake, <S%H4616><s%> O my God, <S%H430><s%> do not delay, <S%H309><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> Thy city <S%H5892><s%> and Thy people <S%H5971><s%> are called <S%H7121><s%> by Thy name. <S%H8034><s%>"

Now while <S%H5750><s%> I was speaking <S%H1696><s%> and praying, <S%H6419><s%> and confessing <S%H3034><s%> my sin <S%H9128><s%> and the sin <S%H9128><s%> of my people <S%H5971><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and presenting <S%H5307><s%> my supplication <S%H8467><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> my God <S%H430><s%> in behalf <S%H5921><s%> of the holy <S%H6944><s%> mountain <S%H2022><s%> of my God, <S%H430><s%>

while <S%H5750><s%> I was still <S%H5750><s%> speaking <S%H1696><s%> in prayer, <S%H8605><s%> then the man <S%H376><s%> Gabriel, <S%H1403><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> I had seen <S%H7200><s%> in the vision <S%H2377><s%> previously, <S%H8462><s%> came <S%H5060><s%> to me in [my] extreme <S%H3286><s%> weariness <S%H3288><s%> about the time <S%H6256><s%> of the evening <S%H6153><s%> offering. <S%H4503><s%>

And he gave <S%H995><s%> [me] instruction <S%H995><s%> and talked <S%H1696><s%> with me, and said, <S%H559><s%> "O Daniel, <S%H1840><s%> I have now <S%H6258><s%> come <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> to give <S%H7919><s%> you insight <S%H7919><s%> with understanding. <S%H998><s%>

"At the beginning <S%H8462><s%> of your supplications <S%H8469><s%> the command <S%H1697><s%> was issued, <S%H3318><s%> and I have come <S%H935><s%> to tell <S%H5046><s%> [you,] for you are highly <S%H9143><s%> esteemed; <S%H9143><s%> so give <S%H995><s%> heed <S%H995><s%> to the message <S%H1697><s%> and gain <S%H995><s%> understanding <S%H995><s%> of the vision. <S%H4758><s%>

"Seventy <S%H7657><s%> weeks <S%H7620><s%> have been decreed <S%H2852><s%> for your people <S%H5971><s%> and your holy <S%H6944><s%> city, <S%H5892><s%> to finish <S%H3615><s%> the transgression, <S%H6588><s%> to make <S%H8552><s%> an end <S%H8552><s%> of sin, <S%H9128><s%> to make <S%H3722><s%> atonement <S%H3722><s%> for iniquity, <S%H5771><s%> to bring <S%H935><s%> in everlasting <S%H5769><s%> righteousness, <S%H6664><s%> to seal <S%H2856><s%> up vision <S%H2377><s%> and prophecy, <S%H5030><s%> and to anoint <S%H4886><s%> the most <S%H6944><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%> [place.]

"So you are to know <S%H3045><s%> and discern <S%H7919><s%> [that] from the issuing <S%H4161><s%> of a decree <S%H1697><s%> to restore <S%H7725><s%> and rebuild <S%H1129><s%> Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> Messiah <S%H4899><s%> the Prince <S%H5057><s%> [there will be] seven <S%H7655><s%> weeks <S%H7620><s%> and sixty-two weeks; <S%H7620><s%> it will be built <S%H1129><s%> again, <S%H7725><s%> with plaza <S%H7339><s%> and moat, <S%H9169><s%> even in times <S%H6256><s%> of distress. <S%H6695><s%>

"Then after <S%H310><s%> the sixty-two weeks <S%H7620><s%> the Messiah <S%H4899><s%> will be cut <S%H3772><s%> off <S%H3772><s%> and have <S%H369><s%> nothing, <S%H369><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> of the prince <S%H5057><s%> who is to come <S%H935><s%> will destroy <S%H7843><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> and the sanctuary. <S%H6944><s%> And its end <S%H7093><s%> [will come] with a flood; <S%H7858><s%> even to the end <S%H7093><s%> there will be war; <S%H4421><s%> desolations <S%H8074><s%> are determined. <S%H2782><s%>

"And he will make <S%H1396><s%> a firm <S%H1396><s%> covenant <S%H1285><s%> with the many <S%H7227><s%> for one <S%H259><s%> week, <S%H7620><s%> but in the middle <S%H2677><s%> of the week <S%H7620><s%> he will put <S%H7673><s%> a stop <S%H7673><s%> to sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> and grain offering; <S%H4503><s%> and on the wing <S%H3671><s%> of abominations <S%H8251><s%> [will come] one who makes <S%H8074><s%> desolate, <S%H8074><s%> even until <S%H5704><s%> a complete <S%H3617><s%> destruction, <S%H3617><s%> one that is decreed, <S%H2782><s%> is poured <S%H5413><s%> out on the one who makes <S%H8074><s%> desolate. <S%H8074><s%>"
